title: Bug 8142: Scoped type hierarchy not available for binary projects
description: Bug 8142: Scoped type hierarchy not available for binary projects. I don't understand it.
EB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I receive the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. By the way, what does the error message mean?
SR: When I click F4 on a binary project selection...
